Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 91st overall pick, by Minnesota in 2005...
Released by Minnesota on 4/1/2006...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 5/26/2006 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/16/2007 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/13/2007 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/30/2009 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/2009 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Arizona on 4/1/2013 (Going to ARI: LF D. Nava, RF J. Maxwell, 2B M. Littlewood, P E. Amett. Going to LAA: P C. Olive, CF R. Bernadina)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/2013, off Jimmy Gobble (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/2013, off Ricky Nolasco (STL)...
Won World Championship with Arizona in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Florida on 9/29/2022...
Injured on 9/17/2023 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 4/22/2024 to a 1-year deal worth $940,000 per year...
